name: Idly God
description:
Idly God is a short and relaxing idle game about being a god and slowly filling your own universe.

Discover all the actions to unlock and all the menu buttons for a soothing and fulfilling experience inspired by classic idle games like the Candy Box 2.

This game was created in a week for the VimJam: Collectables (8 Bits to Infinity).

Remember that every corner is useful.
